txt.en: Instance: Sister of the Gilrain
The Ruthless Dead are attacking from the western banks of the Gilrain.\n\nYou have encountered the Ruthless Dead along the Gilrain and should prevent them from crossing.
Talk to Roamingstar

'You have done well this day, [placeholder].

'The people of my lands have far less to fear now, and I speak not only of the defeat of the Dead.

'Your presence has changed the fate of the war here in Gondor, and I shall ever watch over your deeds in the East.

'Come now, let us return to my glade.'
Follow the Gilrain to the edge of the mere
A watery image of Roamingstar dashes through the shallows of the Gilrain...
Confront Nerzus and the Ruthless Dead
'Let us leave the Dead to contemplate their doom, [placeholder].'

'I feel a chill at the water's edge, [placeholder]....

'The Dead move to cross the river, and they must not be allowed to pass into Lebennin! You are known to them, but I am not... if you can drive them back from the river's edge and lure them to the mere, I shall ensure that they will only find peace far from these lands. Should they dare to cross the Gilrain then... even I do not know what will become of them, but they shall never reach the far banks.

'I can grant you safety in my waters, but if you stray from the Gilrain, I cannot protect you from the Dead!

'Go now, [placeholder]!'
As the last of the Dead vanish, you continue your pursuit of Roamingstar
The Ruthless Dead appear once more, angered by your presence!
The river Gilrain flows south from Roamingstar's glade.\n\nRoamingstar has asked you to follow the Gilrain south to the mere and prevent the Dead from crossing it.
Roamingstar is standing on a small shoal along the Gilrain.\n\nYou have agreed to aid Roamingstar in banishing the Ruthless Dead and should now speak to her.
DNT
As thanks for your aid and to protect the lands of Gondor, Roamingstar seeks to prevent the Ruthless Dead from crossing into Lebennin.
The river Gilrain flows south from Roamingstar's glade.\n\nYou have defeated the Ruthless Dead you encountered along the river's edge and should now continue south.
Defeat the Ruthless Dead trying to cross the Gilrain
The Ruthless Dead are attacking from the western banks of the Gilrain.\n\nThe Ruthless Dead have renewed their attack, and must be defeated before they can cross the Gilrain unhindered.
Follow the Gilrain further south
DNT -- will not be seen
Defeat the Ruthless Dead before they can cross the Gilrain
DNT -- will not be seen
DNT
The river Gilrain flows south to the mere from Roamingstar's glade.\n\nYou have defeated the Ruthless Dead once more and should now meet Roamingstar at the edge of the mere.
Talk to Roamingstar
Nerzus and the Ruthless Host can be found on the western banks of the mere.\n\nYou have encountered Nerzus and his grim host as they ready to cross into Lebennin.
Follow the river south towards the mere

Roamingstar can be found at the edge of the mere along the Gilrain in eastern Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nYou have defeated the Ruthless Dead and driven them far from Dor-en-Ernil. You should now speak to Roamingstar.
Granted a respite, you must now reach Roamingstar
Nerzus of the Ruthless Dead suddenly appears before you!
DNT
Roamingstar's power has banished Nerzus and sent the Ruthless Dead fleeing back to their dark home
